Homeownership Across Race

This visualization imagines differential rates of homeownership as a neighborhood.
Explore how the size of each house changes over time to reflect the rates of homeownership by race.

1994 Homeownership Rates:

White Americans: 10%

Hispanic Americans: 10%

Black Americans: 10%

Native Americans: 10%

Asian Americans: 10%

1994
Move the slider to see how the data changes over time.

Data on homeownership by race comes from the U.S. Census Bureau.
